author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Although Netflix users have often been disappointed that the streaming platform cancels so many of its shows, there are the occasions where the opposite is true. Now fans of one particular series will be ecstatic to know that it will be returning for a second season as confirmed by Netflix. The first season of the [...]

title: Netflix Series Returning For Unexpected Second Season
